DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of DWJ1276
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study for Patients With Hypertension Associated With Dyslipidemia
DOC.criteria: Adult male and female in between ages of 20 and 80 at the time of screening Subject who can understand information provided and who can sign written consent voluntarily Patients with hypersensitivity to olmesartan and rosuvastatin Pregnant or lactating women and fertile women who is not using proper contraceptive method Patient with history of drug or alcohol abuse
